Key Match Events: Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute for a high boot.
Jeremy Sarmiento scored just before halftime to put Ecuador in front.
Jhonder Cadiz scored in the 64th minute to level the scores for Venezuela.
Eduard Bello scored the winning goal for Venezuela in the 74th minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ecuador played most of the match with 10 men after Enner Valencia's red card.
The match was held at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California.
